the triple(prod) laptop by Triple

Our Product

Our Vision

Here at Triple, we aim to accelerate the productivity of innovators everywhere by giving everyone access to the most valuable resource for a digital workspace: a display big enough to match their potential.

We believe that whether you are a digital nomad, are constantly on-the-go, or simply have no office space at all, you deserve to have what you need to be excel in your career endeavors--from programming to streaming to animation and more--and shine in your passion projects.

Most importantly, we believe that this dream should be attainable by everyone. That's why we created the triple(prod) laptop.

Are you ready to see in Triple vision?


triple(prod) Specs

The triple(prod) 2022 is equipped with:

  • 3 15.1-inch 4K screens Unlike other 3-display laptops, the triple(prod) 2022 is a portable size.

  • 5 pounds triple(prod) is nearly impossibly light--less than half of the weight of other 3-display laptops.

  • NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1080 GPU triple(prod) has a powerful graphics card for fast 3D rendering, editing, and gaming.

  • Intel Core i9-12900HK processor triple(prod)'s powerful processor is the highest performing--compared to 10 common laptop CPUs--and ranks second in value for its price.

  • 32GB DDR4 RAM

  • 1TB SSD storage

History

Our Beginning

Triple was founded by Lucky Coyne in 2012, one day after the predicted December 21st cataclysm. Lucky had always had an entrepreneurial spirit, and seeing that the world did not actually end that day, he began the company with his life savings. The company started off by selling custom displays, and quickly developed collaborative relationships with other companies, leading the way to triple(prod) and Triple as we know it today.
